label: Native American Heritage Month
description: Native American Heritage Month book list

A history of the New Hampshire Abenaki
A seat at the table : Huston Smith in conversation with Native Americans on religious freedom
A time before New Hampshire : the story of a land and Native peoples
Atlas of the North American Indian
Bury my heart at Wounded Knee : an Indian history of the American West

Eastern Cherokee stories : a living oral tradition and its cultural continuance
Encyclopedia of native tribes of North America
God, war, and providence : the epic struggle of Roger Williams and the Narragansett Indians against the Puritans of New England
Indian New England, 1524-1674 : a compendium of eyewitness accounts of native American life
Memory lands : King Philip's War and the place of violence in the northeast
Native American testimony : a chronicle of Indian-white relations from prophecy to the present, 1492-1992
Native American testimony : an anthology of Indian and White relations ; first encounter to dispossession
Native American traditions
Native Americans : the life and culture of the North American Indian
Native Americans state by state
Native New Yorkers : the legacy of the Algonquin people of New York
North Country captives : selected narratives of Indian captivity from Vermont and New Hampshire
Skull wars : Kennewick man, archaeology, and the battle for Native American identity
The Abenaki
The Cherokee Nation and the Trail of Tears
The Earth shall weep : a history of Native America
The Native Americans : the indigenous people of North America
The victory with no name : the Native American defeat of the first American army
This land is their land : the Wampanoag Indians, Plymouth Colony, and the troubled history of Thanksgiving
Unworthy republic : the dispossession of Native Americans and the road to Indian territory
Voices of earth and sky; the vision life of the native Americans and their culture heroes
